name: Mcp Builder
description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services through well-designed tools. Use when building MCP servers to integrate external APIs or services, whether in Python (FastMCP) or Node/TypeScript (MCP SDK).
longDescription: Guide for building MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers in both Python (FastMCP) and Node/TypeScript (MCP SDK). Includes 4 reference docs covering best practices, Python server patterns, Node server patterns, and evaluation criteria. Ships with 3 Python scripts: connections.py for testing server connectivity, evaluation.py for automated server quality scoring, plus an example evaluation XML. Covers tool design, error handling, transport configuration, and API integration patterns for servers that work with Claude and other LLM clients.
